sourcesContent:
import React from "react" import {minutesToDuration} from "../utils/duration" const FocusBreakButton = ({ focusDuration, setFocusDuration, breakDuration, setBreakDuration, session, isFocus }) => { const handleIncrease = () => { (isFocus) ? setFocusDuration((duration)=> focusDuration + 1) : setBreakDuration((duration)=> breakDuration - 1) } const handleDecrease = () => { (isFocus) ? setFocusDuration((duration)=> focusDuration - 1) : setBreakDuration((duration)=> breakDuration - 1) } return ( <>
Focus Duration: {focusDuration}
Break Duration: {breakDuration}
{/* TODO: Implement increasing break duration and disable during a focus or break session*/}
) } export default FocusBreakButton
